title: Drawing, Design for Kidney-Shaped Writing Table with Pear-Shaped Feet, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Kidney-Shaped Writing Table with Pear-Shaped Feet
medium: Pen and black ink on thin cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, lower right of sheet: Writing Table / of Mahogany
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Kidney-shaped writing table with single horizontal drawer with 2 round pulls flanked by 4 convex side drawers with pair of round pulls on each; raised on 4 fluted, tapering legs with molded and carved tops terminating.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Kidney-Shaped Writing Table with Pear-Shaped Feet, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-243
